title: 245 Fight for Your Dreams
description:
"You were born with wings. You are not meant for crawling, so don't. You have wings. Learn to use them and fly." - Rumi
If you enjoyed this episode, see show notes and buy a copy of the book at http://lewishowes.com/245
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
